preconditions.precondition: Tester is able to instantiate a new Usuario and a new Referido

successEndConditions.condition: Usuario's balance is successfully updated after adding a Referido

failureEndConditions.condition: Verification of balance by Tester fails

mainSequence.step: Tester instantiates a new Usuario with the name "Juan"
Tester instantiates a new Referido with the name "Pedro"
Usuario appends Referido to their list of referrals
Tester verifies the updated balance of Usuario
